Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package libuv for versions less than 1.48.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24806 affecting package libuv for versions less than 1.48.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libuv is earlier than 1.48.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-24806
